website_summaries.verdict: The Canon PowerShot G3 X couples excellent image quality with a long zoom range, but it really needs a built-in EVF.
pros: Hot shoe supports add-on EVF and Canon Speedlites
cons: Slow burst rate when shooting Raw
Takes a while to turn on

customer_reviews.title: Terrible camera - unreliable
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several of these for business use. Every single one of these have the same faults. They don't always focus when videoing - often going in and out of focus, the record button often sticks so it either doesn't start or stop filming, the zoom often sticks. Worst camera I have ever purchased. The picture and video quality is excellent when it works, but complete waste of money since it doesn't work reliably
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Trigg

customer_reviews.title: High quality images: super wide to tele
customer_reviews.text: This is a great camera. The quality of the images - even at 600mm - is simply breathtaking. The all (mostly) metal construction is very reassuring and it has masses of features and flexibility.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff Sankey

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic zoom while maintaining great photo quality
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic zoom while maintaining great photo quality. Would be 5* if had a built in view-finder. (I know you can buy one to use with this camera, but that is way too expensive.)
customer_reviews.author: Mark Phippen

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly flexible bridge camera
customer_reviews.text: An excellent camera overall, takes pictures every bit as good as my old Pentax K20D with fewer lens artifacts and distortions in a much smaller, lighter package. Why only 4 stars: it's too easy to set the autofocus onto the wrong subject/area by accidentally touching the screen whilst moving it or positioning the camera. By the time you've adjusted the settings (difficult to do if you are holding the camera aloft etc) you miss the shot.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera and very versatile
customer_reviews.text: Feels good in the hand and have had excellent results. Mainly motivated to buy it for the superzoom lens which has opened up all sorts of new possibilities, without the hassle of changing lenses. Getting too old for that!
customer_reviews.author: Orkneyblade

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is a quality piece of kit. I am by no means a photographer, but find this very easy to use and produce stunning pictures and videos.
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: It's anew camera and not second hand..
customer_reviews.text: A beautiful camera, easy to hold, fits in my hand perfectly, just need to get used to the buttons..
customer_reviews.author: Gary Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Great all rounder for holidays
customer_reviews.text: I got sick of carrying around multiple lenses for my DSLR so got this and its brilliant!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love this bridge camera ,its so easy to work and photos seem great so far
customer_reviews.author: marlene watson

customer_reviews.title: Focus Frequently Hunts in Video Mode While Shooting
customer_reviews.text: The video performance was exceedingly disappointing. The picture kept going in and out of focus on many (but not all) of my videos during shooting which completely ruined the video. I definitely would not recommend this camera.
customer_reviews.author: Marc C

customer_reviews.title: fantastic piece of kit
customer_reviews.text: Tried it, played with it, fantastic piece of kit, but didn't buy. A camera like this really has to have a viewfinder. Panasonic do them, Sony do them but still not Canon.
customer_reviews.author: K. F. Harniman

product_meta.title: Canon 0106C010 PowerShot G3 X Camera (20.2 MP, 25x Zoom, Tilt Type 8 cm, sRGB PureColor II G Touchscreen LCD) - Black
product_meta.description:
Combining the versatility of a 25X zoom lens with the premium imaging performance of a 1.0 type sensor, the Powershot G3-X can shoot photos and movies in high quality. An wide range of key features and controls help you unleash your creativity.

BOX CONTAINS
Digital Camera PowerShot G3 X Lens Cap Neck Strap NS-DC11 Battery Pack NB-10L Battery Charger CB-2LCE AC cable User manual kit
feature_bullets: Capture good detail and background blur with 25X optical zoom lens and 1.0 type sensor
A host of handy creative modes, plus Wi-Fi with NFC makes it simple to shoot and share your inspired stills and movies
Expert video shooting features, plus full manual controls help you shoot good Full HD movies with your choice of frame rate
A high resolution, tiltable LCD touch screen and wide range of dials and manual modes put you in control
Dust and drip-proof body for capturing all the actions come rain or shine
Operating humidity range is 10 to 90 percent. Operating Temperature Range is 0 to 40 degree Celsius

specifications.Included Components: Digital Camera PowerShot G3 X Lens Cap Neck Strap NS-DC11 Battery Pack NB-10L Battery Charger CB-2LCE AC cable User manual kit
specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK
